paper_abstract: From an information systems perspective, the assessment of commercial websites can be assessed objectively or subjectively. From a business point of view, they can be assessed quantitatively or qualitatively. This paper describes taxonomy of website assessment approaches and proposes a knowledge-based system approach to evaluate commercial websites effectively. Given a large number of constantly evolving commercial websites on the Internet, our approach shows an efficient way of automatic assessment of commercial websites.
paper_title: Design a knowledge-based system to automatically assess commercial websites
